feed.title: ChangeDetection Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for ChangeDetection: 0.45.25 General bug fixes and improvements
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bump urllib3 from 1.26.18 to 1.26.19 by @dependabot in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2423
  • Prefer pythons built in "importlib" over pkg_resources+setuptools by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2424
  • Using python 3.11 by default - this solves cryptography <-> rustc and builds faster on Rpi etc by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2426
  • Implement jqraw by @Hritik14 in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2430
  • saving snapshot html by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2431
  • Bump docker/build-push-action from 5 to 6 in the all group by @dependabot in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2436
  • added out-of-stock phrases for DE by @maxmichels in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2442
  • UI - Fixing preview/diff "ignore text" highlight button (refactor, didnt work in "preview" mode) by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2455

New Contributors

  • @Hritik14 made their first contribution in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2430
  • @maxmichels made their first contribution in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2442

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/compare/0.45.24...0.45.25

entry.title: New release for ChangeDetection: 0.45.26
entry.content:
Mainly

  • Visual Selector now lets you choose MULTIPLE selections! fantastic.
  • various small bugs and fixes

What's Changed

  • 'tags'' field from old installs could have wrong data-type causing crash by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2460
  • Snapshot count history not updated in watch after [clear history] by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2459
  • Visual selector - should show all matching filter elements from all filters by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2440
  • Visual selector multiple selections by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2465
  • Enhance diff.py with type hints, improved docstrings, and code readability by @nectariferous in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2471
  • Visual Selector should still update when elements were not found by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2476
  • Fixing deprecation warning by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2477

New Contributors

  • @nectariferous made their first contribution in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2471

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/compare/0.45.25...0.45.26

entry.title: New release for ChangeDetection: 0.46.00 - Huge upgrade to "Restock and price detection" module
entry.content:
huge upgrade to restock and price detection

Set rules around the pricing and stock

Manage hundreds of products with a single tag.

What's Changed

  • Bugfix - Watches with BrowserSteps should recreate the data-dir if it was missing (in the case that you deleted/migrated) by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2484
  • Adding simple memory usage test by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2483
  • Just a basic string check is far more efficient for suggestion price/restock check plugin by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2488
  • Restock & Price monitor - Use itemprop where available by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2041
  • Extract as watch listing title should work on all processors by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2490</li> <li>2039 restock use itemprop - improvements by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2492</li> <li>Fixing first history/preview save issue by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2494</li> <li>fixing bad tag value handler by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2498</li> <li>Tweaks to support restock as tags by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2496</li> <li>Ability to use restock price amounts in notifications by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2503</li> <li>Dropping older ARM v6 support due to dependencies not having support by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2506</li> <li>Adding Apple M1 Pro arm64/v8 support docker image by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2507</li> <li>Fixing file:// file pickup by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2505</li> </ul> <p><strong>Full Changelog</strong>: https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/compare/0.45.26...0.46.00</p>

entry.title: New release for ChangeDetection: 0.46.01
entry.content:
Mainly fixes problem sending a test notification

What's Changed

*UI - Fixing up 'test notification' bug from main settings and tag settings pages #2510 (#2511) by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2511

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/compare/0.46.00...0.46.01

entry.title: New release for ChangeDetection: 0.46.02 maintenance release / bug fixes
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • UI - Adding "Download latest HTML snapshot" from Edit Watch > "Stats" page for easier debugging by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2513
  • Use #!/usr/bin/env to support virtualenv by @kruton in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2518
  • When scraping elements, check for null results by @kruton in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2517
  • Encode requests and notifications as UTF-8 if it has no encoding/basic string by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2523
  • Apprise 1.8.1 by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2524
  • Adding test for #1995 UTF-8 encoding in notification body by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2525

New Contributors

  • @kruton made their first contribution in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2518

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/compare/0.46.01...0.46.02
